pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Wednesday, December 16, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and the Deputy Prime Minister will participate in a year-end roundtable interview with The Canadian Press / La Presse Canadienne.

West Block
Parliament Hill

Media appearances

8:15 a.m. A year-end interview with the Prime Minister will air live on CHOM 97.7 FM.

9:15 a.m. A year-end interview with the Prime Minister will air live on Citytv's Breakfast Television Toronto.

5:00 p.m. A year-end interview with the Prime Minister will air on TVA Nouvelles with Pierre Bruneau.
